Feature Type: Torsions ServicesÔÉÅ

Services for torsions feature type.

This submodule provides three specialized services for torsion features:

  • TorsionsSelectionService: Manages feature selection with optional post-selection reduction based on angular flexibility and transition metrics

  • TorsionsReduceService: Provides cross-trajectory reduction methods for torsion feature dimensionality reduction

  • TorsionsAnalysisService: Offers statistical analysis operations on torsion feature data

Each service provides torsion-specific methods tailored to the characteristics and requirements of dihedral angle data.

  • Feature Type: Torsions Analysis Service
  • Feature Type: Torsions Reduce Service
  • Feature Type: Torsions Selection Service
